objects.name: Crawling Taurus
objects.description: Threat Group focusing on Energy, Chemical Industry, Healthcare and Pharma industries. Crawling Taurus, also known as Th3bug, is known for targeted spear phishing campaigns and using Poison Ivy malware.

objects.name: Watering Hole Attack Campaign
objects.description:
The threat group compromised legitimate websites their intended visitors are likely to frequent. Over the summer of 2014, they compromised several sites, including a well-known Uyghur website written in that native language. All of the malware dropped by this watering hole attacks were Poison Ivy Remote Administration Tool (RAT).
The group was actively targeting: Uyghur sympathizers, East Asian office for major US-based computer manufacture, A major US university, and an international wholesale and retail telecom provider
